name: Stellar Survivor
detailed_description:
Stellar Survivor is currently in Early Access which means issues can be expected.
The game might contain bugs, work in progress art, or features not fully developed or balanced yet. As the development of Stellar Survivor continues, we will address these issues and improve the game.



Stranded on an alien planet, you have to defend the Powercore that helps you to stay alive from hostile alien enemies. You have to strategically set up your traps to defend yourself against those aliens. You can choose different traps such as the Spike Trap, Electric Tower, Mines and more! You can freely place these various traps in a tactical way to steer the aliens where you want them to go!

Over the course of waves, the number of aliens increases. You have a variety of weapons you can use against the aliens: Assault Rifle, Shotgun and the Sniper Rifle! Play together with your friends to increase your chance of survival! How long can you stay alive?



  • Play with your friends in drop-in drop-out multiplayer! (Coming soon)
  • Gather resources and build defenses to prepare yourself for the waves of aliens!
  • Fight different alien types, each with their own abilities!
  • Different types of traps, turrets, and defensive structures. Place them strategically to kill as many aliens as possible!
  • Realistic extraterrestrial planet!
  • Destroy the aliens with three different weapons, each suitable for different situations!

At the end of June 2019, Stellar Survivor will fully release. Until then, you can help to improve Stellar Survivor while it is in Early Access. Leave your feedback, opinions and suggestions in the Community Hub of Stellar Survivor!

Make sure to check it out, it is free!



Stellar Survivor is an academic project from third-year students of Creative Media & Game Technologies from Breda University of Applied Sciences, Netherlands. We are a team of 22 motivated students with a great passion for developing video games. With Stellar Survivor, we want to share the experience and knowledge we gathered throughout the last years at school.

short_description: Stranded on an alien planet, you must defend your Powercore! Use your weapons to fight hordes of alien enemies and strategically use traps in this new FPS tower-defense survival game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
